channel.title: Client 562 problem
channel.description:
Hi,
I use 562 Client I have a problem. I compiled my client.. When i turn the client on it stays on this screen:
[img]http://www.freemmorpgmaker.com/files/imagehost/pics/b21412922fa196ae4113d7ebe51447b4.png[/img]
It didnt say connecting to update server before i just compiled it to say that but it is getting stuck on that screen... What is the problem?

item.title: Client 562 problem
item.dc:creator: @benni1996 benni1996
item.description:
@benni1996 wrote:

then the server you are trying to connect to is offline.

Read full topic
